DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim of the study is an early asthma diagnosis in young children by the use of non-invasive biomarkers of airway inflammation /oxidative stress in exhaled air, and early lung function measurements
DOC.brief_title: Early Diagnosis of Asthma in Young Children
DOC.criteria: Children aged 23 years, with recurrent respiratory symptoms suggestive of asthma Children aged 23 years, with no or minor respiratory symptoms Mental retardation Cardiac anomalies Congenital malformations Other diseases of the lungs/airways Chronic systemic inflammatory diseases like M. Crohn The inability to perform lung function measurements and/or exhaled air collection
